CustomField.description:
The primary contact's email address and password as created in the CMS; this will be the admin user for the account and will have access to update Stripe details
Note: As the client can reset their password, this information may not work after it has been shared with the client.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
The primary contact's email address and password as created in the CMS; this will be the admin user for the account and will have access to update Stripe details
Note: As the client can reset their password, this information may not work after it has been shared with the client.
CustomField.label: Client CMS Username & Password
